short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All your content in one personalized podcast feed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AudioFeed allows you to send in all your content and get a personalized feed in the form of audio episodes that provide shortened summaries. Whether it's email, links, or text content, we personalize it and summarize it for you. You can listen to this feed in the Chrome Extension, on our website, or even in your favorite podcast player.
